fr.sorbonne_u.components.helpers

Class TracerConsole

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.components.helpers.TracerConsole
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TracerI

    public class TracerConsole
extends java.lang.Object
implements TracerI
    The class TracerConsole implements a simple tracer for BCM printing trace messages on the console associated to the process.

    Description

    Invariant

     invariant              true

    Created on : 2020-06-24

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected boolean suspendStatus
      True if the trace is suspended and false otherwise.
      protected boolean tracingStatus
      True if traces must be output and false otherwise.
